description english: Date when the tow was performed.
Tow identification number.
Tow numbering used on survey.
description français: Numéro du trait de chalut utilisé sur le relevé.

description english: Whether a tow was successful and suitable for analysis.
description français: Identifiant qui indique si le trait était réussi fiable pour inclusion dans les analyses.

description english: Identified the type of survey sampling station (e.g. 'fixed' or 'free').
description français: Type de station d'échantillonnage (e.g. station fixe ou libre).

description english: Crab fishing area.
Recorded time of the start of active trawling aboard fishing vessel.
Recorded time of the end of active trawling aboard fishing vessel.
Official time of the start of active trawling (i.e. trawl touchdown).
Official time of the end of active trawling (i.e. stop signal and hauling of the net).
description français: Heure de la fin du chalutage.

description english: Time when the trawl net appears at water's surface.
Time when the trawl footrope leaves the sea bottom.
Time when the trawl initially touches bottom.
Official time of the end of active trawling.
Recorded time of the end of active trawling aboard fishing vessel.
Calculated or recorded tow longitude mid point.
Official longitude at the start of active trawling.
Official longitude at the end of active trawling.
Recorded longitude at the start of active trawling.
Recorded longitude at the end of active trawling.
Recorded longitude at the end of active trawling.
Calculated or recorded tow latitude mid point.
Official latitude at the start of active trawling.
Official latitude at the end of active trawling.
Recorded latitude at the start of active trawling.
Recorded latitude at the end of active trawling.
Recorded latitude at the end of active trawling.
Captain aboard research or chartered fishing vessel.
Water depth according to vessel's acoustic sounders.
Observed water temperaturewhen the trawl is actively trawling.
Length of cables used by the trawl.
description français: Longueur des câbles attachées au chalut.

description english: Estimate of trawl swept area.
description français: Estimé de l'aire balayé par le trait de chalut.

description english: Method used to estimate swept area.
description français: Méthode utilisée pour estimé l'aire balayée.

description english: Whether size measurements were made for fish and invertebrate by-catches.
Whether an oceanographic water sample was taken.
Tow comments (e.g. vessel speed or issues).
description français: Commentaires portant sur le trait (e.g. vitesse du navire or problèmes).
